name: Amazon Blue (Godot)
description:
A small endless runner about being sent into space by Amazon to pay off your debt. To pay off this debt, you must clean up trash produced by Amazon in exchange for debt relief. 

This was for a college project, and is the Godot version between the two versions.

Credits:

The engine used is the Godot Engine. All sprites were made by me. Sound effects came from freesound.org and the music came from bensound.com.
